summary: Father's Day Gifts for Your Own Super Hero
title: Father's Day Gifts for Your Own Super Hero
body:
Father’s Day Gifts for Your Own Super Hero

Father’s Day Gifts for Your Own Super Hero

It can be difficult thinking up something new or original every single year for Father’s Day, trust me I feel your pain – what do you get a great super hero Dad who either doesn’t want anything, need anything or is just plain fussy? Well hopefully we can help you out a bit there. All our ideas are super hero themed, so if that’s what he’s into, you’ve…

blog.name: abacada123
blog.title: It's just me...
blog.description: Hi there! Well I finally managed to get a good idea of how to use Tumblr and I guess I'm going to be using for the same reason most people are. To find and share things they like, vent and explore and just to have a laugh. Hope you like that I post/reblog, in the end I'm just having some fun with another place to express myself XD

tags: thor can't use a phone for shit
title: Boyfriend
body:
Pairing: Thor x Reader

Warnings: FLUFF

Summary: Dating a thousand year old god has its ups and downs 


“Lady Y/N i can assure you that i know how to use a phone.” 

“You send emails to text people Thor.” 

You and Thor are sat at your computer screen, Doing what exactly? Nothing. Thor’s just fascinated with the bright colorful box that’s sitting on top of your desk. “oOH” you heard as you pulled up the youtube tap. “Why are you so happy about this?” You turned your head to face your boyfriend that refused to get a chair to sit next to you…he’s on his knees, Well he’s tall enough to see, Guess that’s good enough for him.

 “It’s like, videos in one website that seems entertaining to me.” Thor explained as he stood up. “Now, I would like to use that..phone you were talking about.” You sighed and shook your head at him. You’ve been trying to help him use a phone for about three weeks now, since he came back from Asgard, Tony had asked you to help since he needs to keep in contact with the avengers in case of an emergency. “Stark needs to buy you a phone.” Reaching in your pocket you took your phone out for him, of course unlocking it so he can do whatever he pleased. Sort of. 

“What why is this..I don’t like it, Emails are simple.” Thor had your phone for maybe 3 minutes before giving up. “Thor! come onnn” You followed him as he sat down on your bed. He had rolled his eyes and laid back against your pillows. “Y/N, I don’t like it. But maybe i’ll learn someday.” His deep voiced rumbled off his lips as he rubbed his face with his large hands. You nodded your head before climbing on top of him, your legs straddling his waist. He smiled up at you and you smiled back, You loved this big goofy god that can’t even figure out how to text. With that you leaned down and pressed a soft kiss against his lips, he kissed back, his hands wrapped around your waist to keep you steady, you pulled back and brushed some of his hair with your fingertips. 

“I love you Thor”

“I love you too Y/N”

title: IW loki theory
body: So in light of knowing loki will come back (in the form of past loki after A1) and the very high probability of time travel, i got to thinking about his line right before he dies. Loki loves his brother, yes, but we’ve never seen him be THIS sentimental. We’ve never seen him THIS brave to stand up to anyone more godly than they are - especially to the one we know loki actually fears. “the sun WILL shine on us again” he says it with 100% confidence and calmness in spite of certain death. Is there maybe a chance loki knew all along what was going to happen thanks to a time traveling stark? He knew that these events had to happen in order for everything to line up perfectly to lead to thanos’ eventual defeat? I mean we’ve seen how cunning he can be, we’ve seen his fighting ability and crazy shapeshifting skills and yet he didn’t even try - no more than he had to in order to seal his own fate at least. Does this seem possible or am i looking too far into things??

blog.name: silver-hammer
blog.title: This Is My Design
blog.description: Hi. I am a 20 year old trans guy. I'm only mildly obsessed with Hannibal. I promise.

body:
Roleplay partners wanted!!

These are the pairings I’d like to RP. And unless specifically stated otherwise, I will play either character.

-Hannigram(from Hannibal. I prefer to play as will, but will do either of necessary)

-Stony(Avengers)

-Drarry (Harry Potter. I can RP as Draco)

-Sabriel(Supernatural. I RP as Sam)

I will add more pairings if I think of them. Haha. Please message me if you’re interested! I’m open to both AUS and canon plots.

summary: Un fan de Vengadores ha visto Infinity War ¡unas 43 veces en el cine!
title: Un fan de Vengadores ha visto Infinity War ¡unas 43 veces en el cine!
body:
¿Te crees fan de los Vengadores? ¡A ver si superas a este fanático!

Nem: El observador de Infinity es un apasionado de la saga de superhéroes de Marvel, y para demostrarlo, ha ido a ver Infinity War unas 43 veces en el cine.

El usuario tiene las pruebas para demostrarlo y el pasado miércoles, fue a su cine local para verla por 43ª vez, posando delante del póster de Infinity War con una camiseta de Black Panther.

Today I was featured on https://t.co/tQlZTLUAjn , then I became an actual trending Twitter moment. How do I celebrate?

By watching #InfinityWar for the 43rd time, obviously. pic.twitter.com/2FEUlV6TWr

— Nem: The Infinity Watcher (@NemRaps) June 6, 2018

Y si crees que solo va y posa ante el póster, pues, te has equivocado. Ya que también muestra que colecciona las entradas del cine. 

24th time watching #InfinityWar
Think ill see the movie twice today! pic.twitter.com/aZw6ig0nCM

— Nem: The Infinity Watcher (@NemRaps) May 22, 2018

Los fans se habían dado cuenta de su récord, ya que cada tuit sobre la película ha generado docenas de respuestas. Algunos fueron comentarios alentadores, mientras que otros sugirieron terapia.

And the legend lives on

— Roozter2k (@roozter2k) May 27, 2018

“Y la leyendo continúa”, le comentó un usuario.

pic.twitter.com/snMOx2QgbJ

— Adam♡ (@ConVaLescence_7) May 27, 2018

Y otro, le ha ontestado con el mítico meme de Michael Jordan que dice: “Para. Busca ayuda“.

Y tú que crees, ¿la necesita?

VENGADORES: INFINITY WAR MARCA RÉCORD
La nueva secuela del Universo Cinematográfico de Marvel se ha coronado como la cuarta película más taquillera de la historia los 1.900 millones de dólares en todo el mundo.

Ante el éxito incuestionable de la saga, Marvel ya ha comenzado a trabajar en la siguiente secuela, Vengadores 4, y han prometido “que será mucho más intensa que Infinity War”. Y  si no nos crees, entonces créele a Chris Hemsworth.

El propio Dios del Trueno calificó la experiencia de “increíble”, revelando, además, que los guiones de Infinity War y Vengadores 4 “le sorprendieron”, y admitió que está realmente entusiasmado con el futuro del Universo Cinematográfico.

Vengadores 4 tiene previsto llegar a los cines el 3 de mayo de 2019.

Para seguir leyendo:
Aunque no lo creas, Vengadores 4 ¡será más increíble que Infinity War!
Increíble pero cierto: Ya puedes comprar las cenizas de uno de los personajes fallecidos en Vengadores: Infinity War

Imagen: ©Marvel

Los fans se habían dado cuenta de su récord, ya que cada tuit sobre la película ha generado docenas de respuestas. Algunos fueron comentarios alentadores, mientras que otros sugirieron terapia.

And the legend lives on

— Roozter2k (@roozter2k) May 27, 2018

“Y la leyendo continúa”, le comentó un usuario.

pic.twitter.com/snMOx2QgbJ

— Adam♡ (@ConVaLescence_7) May 27, 2018

Y otro, le ha ontestado con el mítico meme de Michael Jordan que dice: “Para. Busca ayuda“.

Y tú que crees, ¿la necesita?

VENGADORES: INFINITY WAR MARCA RÉCORD
La nueva secuela del Universo Cinematográfico de Marvel se ha coronado como la cuarta película más taquillera de la historia los 1.900 millones de dólares en todo el mundo.

Ante el éxito incuestionable de la saga, Marvel ya ha comenzado a trabajar en la siguiente secuela, Vengadores 4, y han prometido “que será mucho más intensa que Infinity War”. Y  si no nos crees, entonces créele a Chris Hemsworth.

El propio Dios del Trueno calificó la experiencia de “increíble”, revelando, además, que los guiones de Infinity War y Vengadores 4 “le sorprendieron”, y admitió que está realmente entusiasmado con el futuro del Universo Cinematográfico.

Vengadores 4 tiene previsto llegar a los cines el 3 de mayo de 2019.

Para seguir leyendo:
Aunque no lo creas, Vengadores 4 ¡será más increíble que Infinity War!
Increíble pero cierto: Ya puedes comprar las cenizas de uno de los personajes fallecidos en Vengadores: Infinity War

Imagen: ©Marvel

blog.description: Marvel/DC fan. Current tv/book obsessions: Peaky Blinders, King of scars, Band of Brothers, Tom Hardy movies. Book nerd: mostly ya fantasy

summary: So I’m Romanian (small country in Europe) and me and my little sister (12) started talking about her English class. And it turns...
body:
So I’m Romanian (small country in Europe) and me and my little sister (12) started talking about her English class. And it turns out, the teacher spends his time explaining the kids what infinity stones are, and answering questions regarding fan theories about infinity war part 2. When the last movie appeared he entered the classroom saying: “I haven’t seen infinity war, I’m going in the weekend, if anyone spoils it, they won’t pass my class.” And it just warms my heart to know that in a country where the education system sucks we still have teachers who care enough to teach kids the right things in life.

Also, if I chose a teaching career that would totally be me.

title: Heart of Ice
body:
Gwen, a twenty-two year old mutant, joins the Avengers Initiative. Tony Stark Fan-Fiction. <3

Parents.

She couldn’t believe what she was seeing. Who she was seeing. The woman smiled. “Gwen? Darling, we’ve come to take you home,” she said in a simpering tone meant to console Gwen.“I am…

body:

Tony: Peter! I’m gonna take you to jail
Peter P: NO! I lied!
